tool_description: Store images in web and get URL back. Deprecated, please use "Image CDN" API now.
name: Web Image Storage
title: Web Image Storage

api_list.name: Get History

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page you want to return, starting at 0

utterances.utterance: Show me the first page of image storage history with 10 entries per page.
Can you provide the second page of the image history with 15 images per page?
Retrieve the third page of stored images, displaying 25 images per page.
I need the fourth page of the image storage history with a page size of 30.
Get the fifth page of image history, showing 5 images per page.
Please provide the sixth page of the image storage history with 50 entries per page.
Fetch the seventh page of image history with 40 images per page.
I want to see the eighth page of stored images, with 60 images per page.
Show the ninth page of image storage history with 35 images per page.
Can you get the tenth page of the image history with 20 images per page?
